#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Concept =

The project consists of several parts:

= 1: the library =

This main library [python_banking python-banking] is capable of establishing a conversation to a bank server and retrieve account information from it.

= 2: the database =

[Database The database] stores all settings, logins, account info and the transaction list.

= 3: the synchronizer =

[Synchronizer A console script] connects to the set up bank accounts using the above library and synchronizes the transaction database.

= 4: the notifier =

If set up, [Notifier a console script] sends an email whenever a new transaction was detected.

= 5: the web interface =

[WebInterface The Django web interface] shows all transactions and provides some statistics etc.
